packagegui.name: netsnmptrapdcommunities
packagegui.title: NET-SNMP Trap Daemon

field.description: Community Authorization defines communities which are allowed to send traps to this daemon and what actions the daemon will allow. Restrictions may also be placed on the community to limit where the traps may arrive from, and what part of the OID tree it is allowed to work with.
The community name to allow as a source on incoming traps.
Type of events to process using this entry. If no types are slected, all types will be used.
Restrict access to a specified address or subnet. Leave blank to allow full access. Enter "default" to set a base OID restriction for this community from any source.
Restrict the community to part of the tree rooted at this OID. Leave blank to allow full access. A Source Restriction must be set.
